Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.AbstractController
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
BuilderBuildObserver, BuilderMoveObserver, BuilderSetupObserver, ColorChoiceObserver, GodCardChoiceObserver, NewPlayerObserver, NumberOfPlayersObserver, StartPlayerObserver, StepChoiceObserver, ConnectionObserver
public class Controller
extends AbstractController
implements ConnectionObserver
Controller of a MVC pattern. This controller communicates with the model and the view manager to manipulate data and in some case call some functions of the view manager. This controller manages only one model and one view manager

    • manageNextState

      private void manageNextState​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Function to support build and move requests
      Parameters:
      nickname - Nickname of the user that has moved/built

    • checkHasLost

      private void checkHasLost()
      If a player has lost it gets removed and the next player is picked. After that another check is called recursively. If there are 3 or more players only the server sends a message to show that the current player has lost, otherwise and end game message is sent.

    • onDisconnection

      public void onDisconnection​(java.lang.String nickname)
      This update of Controller is called by a specific View's notify when the user wants to disconnect
      Specified by:
      onDisconnection in interface ConnectionObserver
      Parameters:
      nickname - Nickname of the user that wants to disconnect

      Parameters:
